name: FoxTrot (HazelKaplan)
description: When a terrible snow storm separates a mother fox and her pup, she will do anything to see each other again! Play as the mother fox as she follows the stars up a steep mountain trying to not fall below.  This involves making risky and difficult jumps, timing the exact momentum needed to make it one step closer to the top. With much perseverance, it is possible to overcome the most strenuous jumps in order to see her child again!
